Header: Russian navy stage drills near Kaliningrad
Content: Amphibious assault ships, armored personnel carriers and helicopters participated in military exercises at Khmelevka firing ground on the Baltic Sea coast in Kaliningrad region.Drills was staged by the Baltic Fleet forces of the Russian Navy to train amphibious assault.According to the Military Defence Ministry, the mission goals included mine clearing in the landing area and neutralizing the opposing force.20 ships and vessels took part in the operation.
